item.description:
If you like re-enactments of the American Revolution, April 18 has the Battle at Old North Bridge, Concord, and then later, the re-enactment of Battle Road retreat by the British after being driven back at Old North Bridge.

The website at the Minuteman National Historic Park has details on these two locations.

Old North Bridge starts at 8:30 am but you should be there at 8 am to get a good view.

http://www.nps.gov/mi...

This meetup is not formally coordinated, but I will be at Old North Bridge and possibly at Battle Road.

See my photos from last year.
item.name: Re-enactment of North Bridge skirmish and Battle Road and Parker's Revenge
